articles.title: Why MicroStrategy’s Collapse Could Be the Next Black Swan for Crypto in 2026

articles.summary: BeInCrypto: Why MicroStrategy’s Collapse Could Be the Next Black Swan for Crypto in 2026. Could MicroStrategy’s collapse trigger the next crypto crash? A data-driven look at why it may be 2026’s biggest black swan risk for Bitcoin. Related tickers mentioned: BTC-USD.

articles.title: 12 Days of Christmas? 12 Stocks That Are Gifts for 2026.
articles.mainIdea: 12 Days of Christmas? 12 Stocks That Are Gifts for 2026.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: 12 Days of Christmas? 12 Stocks That Are Gifts for 2026.. Barron’s looked at the group of stocks and used Wall Street ratings and price targets by sector to find presents for any type of investor. Nvidia Amazon, and Microsoft shares are loved by the Street, with a Buy rating from more than 90% of the analysts covering them. The average Buy-rating ratio for stocks in the Russell 1000 is currently about 58%. Related tickers mentioned: AMZN, MSFT, NVDA, STRC, STRD, STRF, STRK, TSLA.
